metadata.title: VMware PowerCLI is installed on Windows
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is Microsoft Windows and VMware PowerCLI is installed

criterion.comment: the installed operating system is part of the Microsoft Windows family

metadata.description: Keep ESXi system properly patched

family_test.comment: the installed operating system is part of the Microsoft Windows family

unknown_test.comment: This test must be performed manually.

esxi:vmhost_vib_test.comment: Ensure the 'AcceptanceLevel' of VIBs is not equal to 'CommunitySupported'

esxi:vmhost_acceptancelevel_test.comment: Ensure the VM Host's Software Acceptance Policy is not equal to 'CommunitySupported'

esxi:vmhost_module_test.comment: Ensure the "SignedStatus" property of all modules is equals to "VMware Signed"

esxi:vmhost_ntpserver_test.comment: Ensure at least one qualified NTP Server exists

esxi:vmhost_firewallexception_test.comment: Ensure the 'AllowedHosts.AllIP' property of all network service firewall exceptions is equals to 'false'

unknown_test.comment: This test must be performed manually.

esxi:vmhost_webserverssl_test.comment: Ensure the host's SSL certificates are valid

esxi:vmhost_coredump_test.comment: Ensure at least one qualified core dump server is configured

esxi:vmhost_advancedsetting_test.comment: Ensure 'Syslog.global.logDir' is pattern not match to 'scratch'

esxi:vmhost_account_test.comment: Ensure at least one qualified account exists

unknown_test.comment: This test must be performed manually.

esxi:vmhost_service_test.comment: Ensure the 'DCUI' service's start policy is set to 'Off'
Ensure the 'TSM' service's start policy is set to 'Off'
Ensure the 'TSM-SSH' service's start policy is set to 'Off'

unknown_test.comment: This test must be performed manually.

esxi:vmhost_advancedsetting_test.comment: Ensure 'UserVars.ESXiShellInteractiveTimeOut' is less than or equal to '300'
Ensure 'UserVars.ESXiShellTimeOut' is less than or equal to '3660'

esxi:vmhost_iscsihba_test.comment: Ensure the 'MutualChapEnabled' property of qualified iSCSI Bus Adapters is equals to 'true'

esxi:vmhost_vswitchpolicy_test.comment: Ensure the "forged_transmits" policy on all vSwitches is set to "Reject"
Ensure the "mac_changes" policy on all vSwitches is set to "Reject"
Ensure the "promiscuous_mode" policy on all vSwitches is set to "Reject"

esxi:virtual_portgroup_test.comment: Ensure the VLAN ID on all vSwitches is not equal to "1"
Ensure the VLAN ID on all vSwitches is not equal to "4095"

esxi:vm_advancedsetting_test.comment: Ensure 'tools.setInfo.sizeLimit' is less than or equal to '1048576'

esxi:vm_device_test.comment: Ensure the 'floppy' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'cdrom' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'parallel_port' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'serial_port' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'usb' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'

esxi:vm_harddiskdevice_test.comment: Ensure the 'Persistence' property of qualified hard disks is not equal to 'NonPersistent'
Ensure the 'Persistence' property of qualified hard disks is not equal to 'IndependentNonPersistent'

esxi:vm_advancedsetting_test.comment: Ensure 'log.keepOld' is less than or equal to '10'
Ensure 'log.rotateSize' is less than or equal to '1024000'

family_object.comment: This is the default family object. Only one family object should exist.

file_object.comment: This filepath identifies the PowerShell script launched to initialize the PowerCLI environment

registry_object.comment: This registry key identifies the PowerCLI installation path
registry_object.name: InstallPath

esxi:vmhost_vib_object.comment: Ensure the 'AcceptanceLevel' of VIBs is not equal to 'CommunitySupported'

esxi:vmhost_acceptancelevel_object.comment: Ensure the VM Host's Software Acceptance Policy is not equal to 'CommunitySupported'

esxi:vmhost_module_object.comment: Ensure the "SignedStatus" property of all modules is equals to "VMware Signed"

esxi:vmhost_ntpserver_object.comment: Ensure at least one qualified NTP Server exists

esxi:vmhost_firewallexception_object.comment: Ensure the 'AllowedHosts.AllIP' property of all network service firewall exceptions is equals to 'false'

esxi:vmhost_webserverssl_object.comment: Ensure the host's SSL certificates are valid

esxi:vmhost_coredump_object.comment: Ensure at least one qualified core dump server is configured

esxi:vmhost_advancedsetting_object.comment: Ensure 'Syslog.global.logDir' is pattern not match to 'scratch'

esxi:vmhost_account_object.comment: Ensure at least one qualified account exists

esxi:vmhost_service_object.comment: Ensure the 'DCUI' service's start policy is set to 'Off'
Ensure the 'TSM' service's start policy is set to 'Off'
Ensure the 'TSM-SSH' service's start policy is set to 'Off'

esxi:vmhost_advancedsetting_object.comment: Ensure 'UserVars.ESXiShellInteractiveTimeOut' is less than or equal to '300'
Ensure 'UserVars.ESXiShellTimeOut' is less than or equal to '3660'

esxi:vmhost_iscsihba_object.comment: Ensure the 'MutualChapEnabled' property of qualified iSCSI Bus Adapters is equals to 'true'

esxi:vmhost_vswitchpolicy_object.comment: Ensure the "forged_transmits" policy on all vSwitches is set to "Reject"
Ensure the "mac_changes" policy on all vSwitches is set to "Reject"
Ensure the "promiscuous_mode" policy on all vSwitches is set to "Reject"

esxi:virtual_portgroup_object.comment: Ensure the VLAN ID on all vSwitches is not equal to "1"
Ensure the VLAN ID on all vSwitches is not equal to "4095"

esxi:vm_advancedsetting_object.comment: Ensure 'tools.setInfo.sizeLimit' is less than or equal to '1048576'

esxi:vm_device_object.comment: Ensure the 'floppy' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'cdrom' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'parallel_port' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'serial_port' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'usb' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'

esxi:vm_harddiskdevice_object.comment: Ensure the 'Persistence' property of qualified hard disks is not equal to 'NonPersistent'
Ensure the 'Persistence' property of qualified hard disks is not equal to 'IndependentNonPersistent'

esxi:vm_advancedsetting_object.comment: Ensure 'log.keepOld' is less than or equal to '10'
Ensure 'log.rotateSize' is less than or equal to '1024000'
